sourcesContent:
import UseFetch from "../hooks/UseFetch" import PositiveVote from "./User/PositiveVote" import NegativeVote from "./User/NegativeVote" import '../App.css' import { Link } from "react-router-dom" function ArticlePage({token, articleId, userId}) { const info= UseFetch(`http://localhost:4000/noticia/${articleId}`) return (
{info && info.map(r =>
{userId===r.id ? : <>}

{r?.titulo}

{r?.fecha.split('T00:00:00.000Z')}

{r?.entradilla}

{r?.texto}

{ token ?
: <>}
#{r?.tema}
)}
) } export default ArticlePage;
